page.title: 07Playground Games
page.content: Games We Play Sometimes on the field we play leap frog.we play running races,cartwheels and football.We play bulldog and we play star wars and secret wars,we play Bruce Lee games.Star Wars is an outer space adventure.In it you have to fight Darth Vader and his stormtroopers.Secret wars is about Spiderman and Supermanand and Dr Doom. Bruce Lee is a famous martial arts teacher.Kerry likes playing babies. This is when somebody pretends to be the mum and baby.Sometimes we play follow my leader,it means that you copy the person in front of you. Sometimes we play on the bars and do one hander two hander,that is when you swing with one hand or two hands.When the boys fight they get sent to stand by the wall.
